front.title: Extended Remote Authentication Dial In User Service (RADIUS) Attributes

abstract.t: For the Remote Authentication Dial In User Service (RADIUS) protocol to continue to support new applications, the RADIUS attribute type space must be extended beyond the current limit of 255 possible attribute types while maintaining backwards compatibility with the existing protocol. This document defines a mechanism to accomplish that task, along with standard methods to group together related attributes and to encode values that don't fit into 253 octets.
